definition: to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to grasp (also fig.)/to seize/to hold/assurance/certainty/sure (of the outcome)
working hand/member of a work team/participant/(short form of 第一把手[di4 yi1 ba3 shou3]) the boss
to guard a pass/to check on sth
to stand as a goalkeeper/to keep guard on a gate
to turn around in one's hands/to play with/to fiddle with
to feel the pulse/to take sb's pulse

sentences.english: Prime Minister Ted Heath takes Britain into the European Community
sentences.chinese: 1973年希思首相把英國帶入歐洲共同體。

sentences.english: Does Bruce see him as a left-winger or a central midfielder?
sentences.chinese: 布魯斯會把他當成一個左邊鋒還是中場球員？

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授講的話原原本本紀錄下來然後記住。

sentences.english: While it was a great day, I got a bit sunburned in the water.
sentences.chinese: 今天過得很棒，但我在水裏把自己給曬傷了。

sentences.english: Once again park well away from the area.
sentences.chinese: 再說一遍，把車停得遠遠的。

sentences.english: Place the rice noodles in a large bowl, and cover with warm water.
sentences.chinese: 把米線放進一個大碗裏，然後用溫水浸泡。

sentences.english: B:Here they are, will you weigh all our luggage together?
sentences.chinese: 這些都是，要不要把我的全部行李一起過磅？

sentences.english: He clipped an electronic pulse reader tohis finger.
sentences.chinese: 他把電子脈搏計夾到手指上。

sentences.english: As the winds did those of the upper air.
sentences.chinese: 正如秋風把花瓣在空中揚散。

sentences.english: Most of the global companies are moving manufacturing facilities out-side of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 大多數跨國公司都在把生產設備遷出日本。

sentences.english: Lie on your back with your legs spread or raise your knees to your head.
sentences.chinese: 平躺，張開雙腿或者把膝蓋擡到靠近頭部的地方。

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情況下，把教育時間寫進去是個好主意。

sentences.english: Vernet glanced at the key but made no move to touch it.
sentences.chinese: 韋爾內看了一眼那把鑰匙，卻沒有去動它。

sentences.english: It is possible that you inadvertently took an excessive dose of an over-the-counter preparation.
sentences.chinese: 有可能是你把非處方藥喫過量了。

sentences.english: But in the third week of May, currents drew some of the oil southeast.
sentences.chinese: 但到了5月的第三週，洋流開始把浮油帶向東南方向。

sentences.english: Q. How many fundamentalists does it take to screw in a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 把一個燈泡轉進燈座，需要多少位基要派呢？

definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to watch from a height or distance/to survey

quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
